text: Ken Norton (1943–2013) was an American professional boxer. Ken Norton may also refer to: *Ken Norton Jr. (born 1966), American football coach and former linebacker *Kendrick Norton (born 1997), American football defensive tackle *Ken Norton (basketball) (c. 1914–1996), American basketball coach *Ken Norton (cricketer) (1932–2018), English cricketer ==See also== *Ken Morton (born 1947), English footballer
title: Ken Norton (disambiguation)
